an6.67:1.1: “Mendicants, it’s quite impossible that a mendicant with bad friends, companions, and associates, while frequenting, accompanying, and attending, and following their example, will fulfill the practice dealing with the supplementary regulations.
an6.67:1.2: Without fulfilling the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s impossible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an6.67:1.3: Without fulfilling the practice of a trainee, it’s impossible to fulfill ethics.
an6.67:1.4: Without fulfilling ethics, it’s impossible give up sensual desire, or desire to be reborn in the realm of luminous form or in the formless realm.
an6.67:2.1: It’s quite possible that a mendicant with good friends, companions, and associates, while frequenting, accompanying, and attending, and following their example, will fulfill the practice dealing with the supplementary regulations.
an6.67:2.2: Having fulfilled the practice dealing with supplementary regulations, it’s possible to fulfill the practice of a trainee.
an6.67:2.3: Having fulfilled the practice of a trainee, it’s possible to fulfill ethics.
an6.67:2.4: Having fulfilled ethics, it’s possible give up sensual desire, and desire to be reborn in the realm of luminous form and in the formless realm.”
